required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Camrelizumab Combined With Local Treatment in NSCLC Patients With BM
clinical_study.official_title: Camrelizumab Combined With Chemotherapy and Local Treatment in Non-small Cell Lung Cancer Patients With Brain Metastasis, a Single-arm, Multi-center, Open-labeled Phase II Clinical Trial

brief_summary.textblock: To evaluate the efficacy and safety of Camrelizumab Combined with Chemotherapy and Local Treatment in non-small cell lung cancer with brain metastases.

detailed_description.textblock: To evaluate the efficacy and safety of Camrelizumab Combined with Chemotherapy and Local Treatment of brain metastases (WBRT, r-knife, SRS, etc.) in non-small cell lung cancer patients with brain metastases .
